page.title: 12NEWSTEAD TRADING ESTATE
page.content: Speedi-Pack make beefburgers and sausages. They supply locally as well as exporting goods. The workers are local people and there are about 80. B.A.L. Adhesives make and sell ceramic wall and floor tiles and adhesives. The factory is 18 years old. They export to other countries. This is the only branch in Britain. There are 100 workers and they live locally. Tilsley and Lovatt make and sell diesel engines and generators. the factory is 50 years old. They export to Pakkistan, Phillipines, Hong Kong, Denmark, Belgium and Iraq. It is the only branch in Great Britain, and they have 55 workers who live spread out. There are no shifts and no piece work. Drayton Kiln Co. make kilns and have been there for 17 years. It has 80 to 100 workers, mostly local. It is the only factory, and they do not export.
